name: Caring Creature
description:
Caring Creature

This is our entry to the Ludum Dare 33 Game jam following the "You are the monster" theme.

You are the monster for some - for others you are the world. Take care of your babies, catch munchy ships and feed them. Watch out for the spears, once you die your babies are helpless.

Code and design by Stupid Mindless F. - We are two Berlin based Ex-AAA devs. Follow us on twitter @stupidmindlessf are @freejsf & @DarthCoder

Art by @bernddiemer

Soundfx and music by @almutschwacke

Thanks for playing!
